name: Speak with Bats
summary: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with bats.
description:
You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with bats. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression on bats or Request something from bats.Traits

Sprite: A family of diminutive winged fey with a strong connection to primal magic.
